adjustmentsNotReflected: Some adjustments will not be reflected in your waste balance
adjustmentsReflected: All adjustments will be reflected in your waste balance
checkIntro: Your summary log has been validated and is ready to submit.
checkIntro2: Before submitting, you need to confirm that you're aware of the following.
checkWarningStart: This data will not be saved until you confirm upload. If something looks wrong, you can
complianceBody: By submitting this summary log, you are declaring that you have complied with the requirements of your environmental permit during the reporting period.
complianceSubheading: You must comply with your waste permit
declarationBullet1: the information provided is complete and accurate
declarationBullet2: you have the authority to submit this information on behalf of your organisation
declarationIntro: By submitting this summary log, you confirm that:

failure.ACCREDITATION_INVALID: Summary log accreditation is missing or incorrect
failure.DATA_ENTRY_INVALID: The selected file contains data that's been entered incorrectly - check that the data you've entered matches the examples provided in the summary log
failure.FILE_TOO_LARGE: The selected file must be smaller than {{maxSize}}MB
failure.FILE_VIRUS_DETECTED: The selected file contains a virus
failure.FILE_WRONG_TYPE: The selected file must be a .XLSX
failure.MATERIAL_INVALID: Summary log material is missing or incorrect
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_DATA_INVALID: There is a problem with your registration - please contact support
failure.PROCESSING_TYPE_INVALID: The summary log template you're uploading is incorrect - make sure you download the correct template for your registration or accreditation
failure.REGISTRATION_INVALID: Summary log registration is missing or incorrect
failure.ROW_ID_MISMATCH: The selected file contains different row IDs to the last summary log you submitted - check that you have been working in the same spreadsheet
failure.SEQUENTIAL_ROW_REMOVED: Rows have been removed since your summary log was last submitted - these must be re-added before you can submit your file
failure.STRUCTURE_INVALID: The columns in the file you selected have been changed - they must match the columns of the summary log template you originally downloaded
failure.TECHNICAL_ERROR: Sorry, there is a problem with the service - try again later
failure.TEMPLATE_VERSION_INVALID: The template version is not recognised
failure.TEMPLATE_VERSION_REQUIRED: The template version could not be determined

loadsAddedExplanation: These loads include all the information required in section {{sectionNumber}} of your summary log.
loadsAdded_one: {{count}} new load will be added to your waste balance
loadsAdded_other: {{count}} new loads will be added to your waste balance
loadsAdjustedExplanation: These loads include all the information required in section {{sectionNumber}} of your summary log.
loadsNotAddedExplanation: These loads are missing information from section {{sectionNumber}} of your summary log. They will not be added to your waste balance until you provide the missing information.
loadsNotAdded_one: {{count}} new load will not be added to your waste balance
loadsNotAdded_other: {{count}} new loads will not be added to your waste balance
processingKeepOpen: Keep this page open and do not refresh it.
processingMessage: Your summary log is being uploaded and automatically validated
rowIdExplanation: These reference numbers are found in the 'Row ID' column of your summary log.
submittingHeading: Your waste records are being updated
submittingMessage: This may take a few minutes.
successBodyText: You can upload an updated summary log whenever you need to provide new data.
supersededHeading: This summary log has been replaced
supersededMessage: A newer summary log has been uploaded. This upload is no longer being processed.
tooManyAdjustedLoadsToList: As there are 100 or more adjusted loads, we are not able to list them all here.
tooManyLoadsToList: As 100 or more loads are missing data, we are not able to list them here. If you need detailed guidance on how to record all the necessary data in your summary log, you can read the supplementary guidance.
uploadConflictHeading: Your waste records cannot be updated
uploadConflictIntro: A summary log that includes different data has already been uploaded.
uploadConflictNextStep1: Check with your colleagues to see if someone else has uploaded a summary log recently.
uploadConflictNextStep2End: to check your waste records. If you need to upload an updated summary log, make sure it contains all the data that was included last time it was uploaded.
uploadConflictReason1: someone else from your organisation has just uploaded a different summary log
uploadConflictReason2: you confirmed the upload of this summary log a long time after you chose the file to upload
validationFailuresDescription1_one: We've found the following issue with the file you selected.
validationFailuresDescription1_other: We've found the following issues with the file you selected.
validationFailuresDescription2_one: You will need to correct this issue before you can upload the file.
validationFailuresDescription2_other: You will need to correct these issues before uploading the file again.
validationFailuresHeading: Your summary log cannot be uploaded
